set_block.title: Set Block
set_block.description: Sets this block to another block type.
set_block.deprecationMessage: This event will be deprecated in 1.21.20 in favor of custom components

block_type.title: Block Type
block_type.description: The type of block to set.

set_block.deprecationMessage: This property requires the following experimental toggle(s) enabled in your project config: 'holidayCreatorFeatures'.
